Need help?
==========

**Need Help?**  Citizen Service Request
=======================================

[Make a citizen service request](https://edisonnj.qscend.com/311/request/add)  

* Have a concern or request for a Township service? Submit a citizen service request online.

E-Newsletter![The Edison E-lluminator](https://www.edisonnj.org/wesbsite.png)

[Sign up for Township E-newsletter](https://lp.constantcontactpages.com/sl/lc6HJgM/EdisonNewsletter)  

* Edison Township’s E-lluminator digital newsletter provides regular updates on Township events, news, and programs.

Achievements Atlas

[2022-25 Achievements Atlas: Your Tax Dollars at Work](https://www.edisonnj.org/EDISON%20TOWNSHIP%20ATLAS%20V3%20.pdf)  

* Edison Township’s Achievements Atlas highlights the transformative accomplishments of Mayor Joshi’s administration since 2022, including revitalized infrastructure, expanded public services, and a focus on long term growth. It serves as a comprehensive guide to the Township’s progress, showcasing the administration's commitment to improving the quality of life for residents of all ages across the community.

Property Tax Relief Programs

  
![WEBSITE BANNER (003)](https://www.edisonnj.org/WEBSITE%20BANNER%20(003).png)  
[Property Tax Relief Programs](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/ptr/index.shtml)

* New Jersey has a new and simplified process for residents to apply for property tax relief programs. **T****here is a single combined application for the Senior Freeze (Property Tax Reimbursement), ANCHOR, and Stay NJ programs for residents 65 and over, or those collecting Social Security, Disability Benefits.** The state will determine your eligibility and send a letter with the specific benefits you qualify for.
* The deadline for the 2024 application is October 31, 2025.
  + [Click to Apply Online](https://propertytaxreliefapp.nj.gov/)
  + [Click for Printable Application](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/propertyreliefforms.shtml)
* About the programs:
  + [Senior Freeze (Property Tax Reimbursement)](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/ptr/index.shtml)
    - The Senior Freeze Program reimburses **eligible senior citizens and disabled persons** for property tax or mobile home park site fee increases on their principal residence (main home). To qualify, you must meet all the [eligibility requirements](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/ptr/eligibility.shtml) for each year from the base year through the application year. For more information on the program and eligibility, visit [Senior Freeze.](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/ptr/index.shtml)

* + [Affordable New Jersey Communities for Homeowners and Renters (ANCHOR Program)](https://nj.gov/treasury/taxation/anchor/index.shtml)
    - You may be eligible for property tax relief. The Affordable New Jersey Communities for Homeowners and Renters (ANCHOR) program provides property tax relief to **New Jersey residents who owned or rented their principal residence** (main home) on October 1, 2020, and meet the income limits. For any questions, call the ANCHOR hotline at 1-888-238–1233. Homeowners can search for their property using the [Anchor Program Lookup](https://www.middlesexcountynj.gov/?splash=https%3a%2f%2fexperience.arcgis.com%2fexperience%2f7fd3f42e91c74265a561347148182012%2f&____isexternal=true) or search for a copy of their deed using the [Middlesex Clerk Records Search Tool.](https://www.middlesexcountynj.gov/?splash=https%3a%2f%2fmcrecords.co.middlesex.nj.us%2frecordssearch%2f&____isexternal=true) For more information on the program and eligibility, visit [ANCHOR Program.](https://nj.gov/treasury/taxation/anchor/index.shtml)
  + [Stay NJ](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/staynj/index.shtml)
    - The Stay NJ program offers property tax benefits to **eligible homeowners aged 65 and older**. It reimburses applicants for 50% of their property tax bills, up to a maximum of $13,000, with a 2024 benefit cap of $6,500. To qualify, you must have owned and lived in your home for the full 12 months of 2024 and have an income below $500,000. Mobile homeowners are not eligible. For more information on the program and eligibility, visit [Stay NJ](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/staynj/index.shtml).

PSE&G Affordability Guide

[PSE&G Affordability Guide](https://www.edisonnj.org/Affordability%20Guide%20Rev%202.2.pdf)  

* PSE&G offers guidance on home energy savings programs, help paying bills, and other energy saving websites. For more information, click: [PSE&G Affordability Guide.](https://www.edisonnj.org/Affordability%20Guide%20Rev%202.2.pdf)
